attributes.additional_details:
Police should never have the power to harm children. Yet they now do abuse children in many ways without thinking about the consequence of their actions.

Some police powers need to be removed so children are protected at all times.
attributes.background:
Take away power from all police forces here in the UK so they cannot harm children as they are doing now.

A child as young as 8 has been strip searched. This needs to be stopped NOW.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635521
